questions.quote: Oh, by the way, your stationery store guy called and he's got your pencil.
We did! We pulled it off! I can't believe it! Where's the needle?
Hello. No she's not here. Okay, fine, whatever. I'll tell her. Okay. Goodbye. The stationery store guy called to say he ORDERED your pencil.
Here's one. I borrowed Puddy's car and all the presets on his radio were Christian rock stations.
Ah, they turned brown!!Â  Brown!!  So let me ask you something, you know any women we could call?
Wait a minute, Just wait a minute...Elaine, Elaine! Now you're smart, is it statue or statute of limitations?
Well so what's the problem, you just put some newspaper down.
I told you not to say anything. You can't go in there, brazenly flaunt the rules and then think I'm gonna share with you!
You know I think ultimately, I'm upset with myself. I knew what I was getting into, she's a bitter, unstable person. I mean the sex was good. I'm sure it was fine for her. I need more.
Is that right? I just threw away a lifetime of guilt-free sex, and floor seats for ever sporting event in Madison Square Garden. So please, a little respect. For I am Costanza: Lord of the Idiots!
